The External_mask main function is the script entry point to process an external mask and prepare it to be
hypso.classification.WaterDetect.runWaterDetect.main()

The main function is just a wrapper to create a entry point script called waterdetect. With the package installed you can just call waterdetect -h in the command prompt to see the options.

hypso.classification.WaterDetect.runWaterDetect.debug(args)
hypso.classification.WaterDetect.runWaterDetect.debug_path(path, name, list_files=False)
hypso.classification.WaterDetect.runWaterDetect.process_ext_masks()

The External_mask main function is the script entry point to process an external mask and prepare it to be consumed by the WaterDetect.
